scripts.build:setup: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -v meta/* dist
scripts.build:content: cp content_scripts/content-root.css dist/content-root.css && tsc content_scripts/content-root.ts --outDir dist && (tsc --removeComments content_scripts/app/config-overrides.ts || true) && cd content_scripts/app && (yarn react-app-rewired build || true) && cp build/main.js ../../dist/content-react.js
